name: Red Pepper And Cucumber Salad
keywords: bell pepper, cucumber, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 large red bell peppers, cut in julienne strips
4 Kirby cucumbers, scrubbed; or 2 regular cucumbers, peeled; cut into batons
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk vinegar with oil in salad bowl and stir in scallions.
Add red peppers and cucumbers; toss with pepper. Sprinkle with chives and serve.
